patthana8.68:4.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.68:5.1: Nanarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.68:6.1: Narūpāvacarañca nanarūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.68:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
